content.content: You can apply for a higher arranged overdraft limit above the interest-free arranged overdraft limit. A preferential arranged overdraft interest rate is available for our ufirst Private customers.

Your debit balance should not exceed your arranged overdraft limit. If your account overruns without formally agreeing an overdraft, or you exceed your arranged overdraft limit, this is called unarranged borrowing. When this happens, you will incur Unarranged Borrowing charges as shown in our ['A Guide to Personal Account Fees and Interest' brochure](http://digital.ulsterbank.ie/content/dam/Ulster/documents/RI%20Region/ri-personal-ulst-brochures/a-guide-to-personal-accounts-fees-and-interest-ULST1376RI.pdf). You will also incur Unarranged Borrowing Interest, which consists of the arranged overdraft interest rate for your account type plus an additional 9% (variable) surcharge rate.

Lending criteria, terms and conditions apply. Credit facilities are available to over 18s only. An overdraft is repayable on demand. Please refer to our booklet [A guide to personal accounts fees and interest](http://digital.ulsterbank.ie/content/dam/Ulster/documents/RI%20Region/ri-personal-ulst-brochures/a-guide-to-personal-accounts-fees-and-interest-ULST1376RI.pdf) for more details.

metaData.heading: Need to apply for a Preferential arranged overdraft interest rate?

content.content: You can apply for a Preferential arranged overdraft interest rate by contacting your Relationship Manager.

metaData.heading: Here's what other people are asking

content.heading: Can I open more than one packaged account?

content.content: If you already hold a packaged account from Ulster Bank and are satisfied to open an additional packaged account, please note that there may not be any additional advantage for you opening another account for the following: Travel Service, Airport Lounge Access, Tailored Personal Loan Rates, Tailored Mortgage Rates, Commission Free Travel Money, Worldwide Travel Insurance and Car Insurance discount (if you have more than two packaged accounts). You will also be charged an additional monthly membership fee on the new packaged account.

content.heading: Are all the benefits available if I live abroad?

content.content: If you are living abroad or plan on living abroad, it is important to note that some of the benefits attached to your account are only available when you are visiting the Republic of Ireland or when you are resident in the Republic of Ireland. For further information please call ufirst Private Membership Services on *[1890 825 125982](tel:1890825125982)* or from outside the Republic of Ireland call *[00 44 2392 676 982](tel:00442392676982)*.
